评论详情: Mom is a plus size on the smaller size of the plus and this was quite SMALL!  The embroidered portion on the top was coming apart upon arrival.  Wont be ordering again but if anyone orders it think of buying 2 sizes larger than your size as this thing shrinks

I was skeptical when I ordered but the price was so reasonable I decided to give it a go. I ordered the green.  It looks just as it does in the pictures, the fabric is natural not plastic feeling.  I get complements everytime I wear it.  I ordered a second one in off white color.

评论概述: Realy pleased with top and had aperson say how nice the top was
评论详情: I had been looking at this top for a few weeks so I decided to go for it, so pleased that I did, it’s really nice. Good quality, well made and fits perfectly. I am tempted by the other colours too.

评论概述: Bought on a whim. Good price, comfortable fit, promptly delivered
评论详情: I love these tunics, I have a few, and wear them all the time. I'm a pear shape, and they're a perfect shape for me - fitted nicely at the top, and flared/a-line lower down. These tunics hang really well, and are not just bag and baggy, like some flared tunics. They flare well to give a nice shape. The print choices are lovely, and the quality is fantastic for the price, really well made. I love the feel of it very comfortable and fit of the sleeves and neckline are flattering. These XPSJBBB tunics really feel like a more expensive top.

Beauitful & for me true to size. I was so pleased with my first purchase, I bought two more. Really comfortable & easy to ware, great length. So great fit, I am a size 10/12. Washed in machine inside out on cool hand wash program. Then just hang out to dry. I didn't need to iron mine, i just made sure i hung the garment from under the arms on the line or dry inside on coat hanger.

Lovely top. I am a 14 and went for xl. Nice length and not tight on the arms. Lightweight. stretchy & soft texture, nice to wear. So fitted on the chest and hangs loose everywhere else. Happy with my purchase! Good value for money. Love the design!
